Activate 1 Interact

Better known as the shrieking toadstool, the tragzioma fungus releases spores when disturbed by browsers, sending nearby creatures into a screaming panic that attracts opportunistic carnivores. Delicate alchemical processes have stabilized and concentrated the spores into a poison.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28]

Onset 1 round

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2} (1 round)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 3} (1 round)

Stage 3 frightened 3 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fleeing] for 1 round (1 round)
